scripts.dev: cmd "/k call "$INIT_CWD/.venv/Scripts/activate.bat" && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000" || sh "$INIT_CWD/.venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.build: echo 'Python build â€“ nothing to do'
scripts.postinstall: (python3 -m venv "$INIT_CWD/.venv" || python3 -m venv "$INIT_CWD/.venv") && (cmd "/k call \"$INIT_CWD/.venv/Scripts/activate.bat\" && pip install -r \"$INIT_CWD/requirements.txt\"" || sh -c 'source "$INIT_CWD/.venv/bin/activate" && pip install -r "$INIT_CWD/requirements.txt"')
